name: btjgenshinps
description: A Click-To-Run Application To Help You Access Grasscutter GenshinPS.

scripts.package: electron-packager ./ BTJGenshinPS --platform=win32 --overwrite --icon=./dist/favicon.ico --arch=ia32 --asar --ignore=GateServer --ignore=data --download.mirrorOptions.mirror=https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/electron/ && xcopy .\data .\BTJGenshinPS-win32-ia32\resources\data /E /I && xcopy .\GateServer .\BTJGenshinPS-win32-ia32\resources\GateServer /E /I && node rm-locales.js

author: BTJ
